DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a new dosage form and dose of orlistat is equivalent to the currently marketed form.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Pharmacologic Equivalence of Two Orlistat Dosage Forms
DOC.criteria: age: 1860 years Body Mass Index: 2533 gastrointestinal disease organ transplant HIV, hepatitis B or C food allergies alcohol or other substance abuse smoking
